service.name: createAcctgTransAndEntries
service.description: Takes a list of AcctgTransEntry entries, verifies that the list of entries are valid (GL account and organizationParty exist), and then creates an AcctgTrans entry and stores all the AcctgTransEntries with the acctgTransId. Note that this does not actually check that the debits and credits balance out. The idea is that unbalanced transactions can be created here, but they will need to be created before they are actually posted, and a later posting service will actually check that the transaction is balanced.
